name: Roasted Url Shortener
author: Roasted Bytes Team

sections.description: The plugin is for those people who don’t want to use third party services to create shortened urls for their wordpress posts. The plugin simply creates another shareable link for your wordpress posts that you can share with people.
sections.installation: Nothing fancy in here. Go to wordpress admin’s plugin page, find the plugin and activate it. Oh wait. Have you copied the plugin to the plugin’s directory yet?
sections.faq: If you have any questions, do ask me at we@wittylog.com. Read more about plugin at http://wittylog.com/5ZEqW

short_description: The plugin creates a short url for your blog posts using the same domain as your wordpress installation. So you don't rely on thirdparty services …
description: The plugin is for those people who don’t want to use third party services to create shortened urls for their wordpress posts. The plugin simply creates another shareable link for your wordpress posts that you can share with people.

upgrade_notice: Make sure to upgrade to the latest release when possible to ensure you avoid bugs others have found.
